name: Platform Strike
description:
A,D to move

W to Jump and Climb Ladders

Grab ledges automatically

Mouse to aim amd LMB to shoot

Your actions matter. How you approach the enemies will determine how well you score

Face the consequences of every single path you decide to go and explore while in constant combat

Make sure to explore well for medkits and to use the environmental elements to your advantage( Explosions and Rotating spikes harm enemies AND you)

Fire enemies also explode when killed and can cause a chain reaction if utilized properly
